languages.text: {n}Стальные когти впиваются в руку мертвеца.{/n} "В ране сокрыт ответ. Ты старательно перевязывал ее... Не в святилище, раньше. Что-то ударило тебя, разорвало ткани и обожгло, обратило кисть в бесполезную плеть. Это был не огонь, нет". {n}Судорожный вздох — и девушка распахивает глаза.{/n} "Гнев проводящего заряда. Он пометил тебя, еретик. Я узнаю твою рану, ведь я видела подобные у людей, которых проводила на иную сторону в палатах плазмадвигателя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Стальные когти впиваются в руку мертвеца. {/n} "В ране сокрыт ответ. Ты старательно перевязывал ее... Не успел бы в святилище, значит, раньше. Что-то ударило тебя, разорвало ткани и обожгло, обратило кисть в бесполезную плеть. Это был не огонь, нет". {n}Судорожный вздох — и девушка распахивает глаза.{/n} "Движущая сила. Подобные раны остаются на телах тех, кто работает у ее источников. Я видела такие у людей, которых проводила на иную сторону в палатах плазмадвигателя".

languages.text: {n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."
languages.original_text: {n}Стальные когти впиваются в руку мертвеца.{/n} "В ране сокрыт ответ. Ты старательно перевязывал ее... Не в святилище, раньше. Что-то ударило тебя, разорвало ткани и обожгло, обратило кисть в бесполезную плеть. Это был не огонь, нет". {n}Судорожный вздох — и девушка распахивает глаза.{/n} "Гнев проводящего заряда. Он пометил тебя, еретик. Я узнаю твою рану, ведь я видела подобные у людей, которых проводила на иную сторону в палатах плазмадвигателя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

"The edges are charred. The tissue is torn. The thumb is almost non-functional. He held the weapon with only three fingers, helping himself with the other hand. There's fyceline residue on that, too. The perpetrator had only recently received this wound, but he would not have had the time to dress it inside the shrine. Similar marks and odours are left on the bodies of those who work near the sources of the Motive Force. I have seen them on the ones I have escorted to the other side inside the plasma drive chambers."

{n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

"The edges are charred, the tissue torn, and the thumb is barely functional. He held the weapon with only three fingers, steadying himself with his other hand. There's fyceline residue on that, too. The perpetrator had only recently received this wound, and he did not have time to dress it inside the shrine. Similar marks and odours have been found on the bodies of people working near the sources of the Motive Force. I myself have encountered them, on those I escort to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

{n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

{n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless scrap. It wasn't fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

{n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

languages.text: {n}Ihre stählernen Klauen bohren sich in den Arm des Toten.{/n} "Eure Wunde birgt die Antwort. Ihr habt sie sorgsam verborgen ... Nicht im Inneren des Schreins. Davor. Etwas hat Euch attackiert, hat das Gewebe zerfetzt, hat Euch verbrannt und Eure Hand in einen wertlosen Lumpen verwandelt. Das war kein Feuer, nein." {n}Kibellah holt keuchend Luft und öffnet die Augen.{/n} "Der Zorn der leitenden Entladung. Er hat Euch gebrandmarkt, Ketzer. Ich erkenne Eure Wunde, denn ich habe sie selbst schon an den Leuten gesehen, die ich in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern auf die andere Seite geleite."
languages.original_text: {n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ihre stählernen Klauen bohren sich in den Arm des Toten.{/n} "Eure Wunde birgt die Antwort. Ihr habt sie sorgsam verborgen ... Nicht im Inneren des Schreins. Davor. Etwas hat Euch attackiert, hat das Gewebe zerfetzt, hat Euch verbrannt und Eure Hand in einen wertlosen Lumpen verwandelt. Das war kein Feuer, nein." {n}Kibellah holt keuchend Luft und öffnet die Augen.{/n} "Der Zorn der leitenden Entladung. Er hat Euch gebrandmarkt, Ketzer. Ich erkenne Eure Wunde, denn ich habe sie selbst schon an den Leuten gesehen, die ich in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern auf die andere Seite geleite."

"Die Kanten sind verkohlt, das Gewebe ist zerrissen und der Daumen kaum einsatzfähig. Er hielt die Waffe mit nur drei Fingern und stabilisierte sich mit der anderen Hand. Es finden sich darauf auch Rückstände von Fycelin. Die Wunde war relativ neu, aber hätte er sie im Schrein erlitten, hätte er nicht die Zeit gehabt, sie zu verbinden. Ähnliche Spuren und Gerüche finden sich auch bei Leuten, die in der Nähe der Antriebskraft arbeiten. Ich habe sie selbst bei Personen gesehen, die ich in den Plasmatriebwerk-Kammern mit auf die andere Seite nehme."

languages.text: {n}Sus garras de acero se clavan en el brazo del hombre muerto.{/n} «Tu herida tiene la respuesta. La has vendado con cuidado... no en el templo. Antes. Algo te impactó, arrancó el tejido, te quemó, convirtió tu mano en un muñón inservible. No fue el fuego, no». {n}Con un aliento laborioso, Kibellah abre los ojos.{/n} «La furia de la carga conductora. Te ha marcado, hereje. Reconozco tu herida, pues yo misma la he encontrado en quienes llevo al otro lado desde las cámaras del motor de plasma».
languages.original_text: {n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus garras de acero se clavan en el brazo del hombre muerto.{/n} «Tu herida tiene la respuesta. La has vendado con cuidado... no en el templo. Antes. Algo te impactó, arrancó el tejido, te quemó, convirtió tu mano en un muñón inservible. No fue el fuego, no». {n}Con un aliento laborioso, Kibellah abre los ojos.{/n} «La furia de la carga conductora. Te ha marcado, hereje. Reconozco tu herida, pues yo misma la he encontrado en quienes llevo al otro lado desde las cámaras del motor de plasma».

«Los bordes están chamuscados, el tejido está desgarrado y el pulgar apenas le funcionaba. Empuñaba el arma con solo tres dedos y la afianzaba con la otra mano. También detecto un residuo de fycelina. La herida era reciente, pero de haberla sufrido en el templo no habría tenido tiempo de vendarla. Se dan marcas y olores similares en personas que trabajan cerca de los generadores de la Fuerza Motriz. Yo misma los he visto en los cadáveres de las víctimas que he enviado al otro lado en el interior de las cámaras del motor de plasma».

languages.text: {n}彼女の鋼の爪が死んだ男の腕に食い込む。{/n}「この傷がその答えだ。気を付けて手当てしていたが…神殿の中ではない。その前だ。何かに攻撃され、その肉体を切り裂き、焼いて、腕を使い物にならない塊とした。火によるものではない」{n}荒く息をしながら、キベラは目を開ける。{/n}「動力の猛威。それが異端者であるお前に刻印を施した。お前の傷を知っている。プラズマ ドライブ室の中であの世へと連れて行った者たちの体にあったものだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼女の鋼の爪が死んだ男の腕に食い込む。{/n}「この傷がその答えだ。気を付けて手当てしていたが…神殿の中ではない。その前だ。何かに攻撃され、その肉体を切り裂き、焼いて、腕を使い物にならない塊とした。火によるものではない」{n}荒く息をしながら、キベラは目を開ける。{/n}「動力の猛威。それが異端者であるお前に刻印を施した。お前の傷を知っている。プラズマ ドライブ室の中であの世へと連れて行った者たちの体にあったものだ」

「縁は焦げて、組織は引き裂かれ、親指はほとんど機能していない。彼は3本の指だけで武器を持ち、もう片方の手で体を支えていた。もう片方の手にはファイセリン燃料が付着しているわ。この傷を負ったのはつい最近のことだけど、神殿の中で負ったものであれば、手当てをする時間はなかったはず。似たような傷や匂いは、動力の近くで働く人々の体にも見られるわ。私もプラズマ・ドライブ室で向こう側へ連れて行く際に、そのようなものに遭遇したことがある」

languages.text: {n}她的钢爪刺入了死者的手臂。{/n}“你的伤口会告诉我答案。你精心包扎好了伤口……但并不是在这间圣殿里，而是在这之前。有什么东西弄伤了你，撕开了你的皮肉组织，留下了烧伤，把你的手变成了毫无用处的肿块。那不是火，不是。”{n}绮贝菈吃力地吸了口气，睁开了双眼。{/n}“那是狂暴的电流，它在你身上留下了印记，异端分子。我认出了你的伤口，因为我曾在等离子驱动室将异端分子带往彼岸，那些人身上也有着同样的烧伤。”
languages.original_text: {n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

traits.locale_text: {n}她的钢爪刺入了死者的手臂。{/n}“你的伤口会告诉我答案。你精心包扎好了伤口……但并不是在这间圣殿里，而是在这之前。有什么东西弄伤了你，撕开了你的皮肉组织，留下了烧伤，把你的手变成了毫无用处的肿块。那不是火，不是。”{n}绮贝菈吃力地吸了口气，睁开了双眼。{/n}“那是狂暴的电流，它在你身上留下了印记，异端分子。我认出了你的伤口，因为我曾在等离子驱动室将异端分子带往彼岸，那些人身上也有着同样的烧伤。”
“边缘烧焦，组织撕裂，拇指几乎已经不能用了。这个人当时是用三根手指握着武器，用另一只手保持身体稳定。他的另一只手上也有火药的残留物，而且是最近才受的伤。不过，伤口不是在圣殿里留下的，因为如果是那样的话，他是来不及包扎伤口的。在源力附近工作的人身上都会有类似的痕迹，散发类似的味道。我之前曾在等离子驱动室里将一部分人带到彼岸，我在那些人身上亲眼见到过同样的烧伤。”

languages.text: {n}Ses griffes d'acier s'enfoncent dans le bras du mort.{/n} « Votre blessure détient la réponse. Vous l'avez soigneusement pansée... Non pas dans le sanctuaire, mais avant cela. Quelque chose vous a frappé et a arraché les tissus et brûlé, réduisant votre main à l'état de moignon inutile. Ce n'était pas le feu, non... » {n}Kibellah ouvre les yeux en inspirant avec difficulté.{/n} « La fureur de la charge conductrice. C'est elle qui vous a marqué, hérétique. Je reconnais votre blessure, car j'ai moi-même pu l'observer sur ceux que j'accompagne de l'autre côté dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. »
languages.original_text: {n}Her steel claws dig into the dead man's arm.{/n} "Your wound holds the answer. You dressed it carefully... Not inside the shrine. Before that. Something struck you, ripped the tissue apart, burned you, turned your hand into a worthless lump. It was not fire, no." {n}Drawing a ragged breath, Kibellah opens her eyes.{/n} "The fury of the conductive charge. It has marked you, heretic. I recognise your wound, for I myself have encountered it on those I take to the other side within the plasma drive chambers."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ses griffes d'acier s'enfoncent dans le bras du mort.{/n} « Votre blessure détient la réponse. Vous l'avez soigneusement pansée... Non pas dans le sanctuaire, mais avant cela. Quelque chose vous a frappé et a arraché les tissus et brûlé, réduisant votre main à l'état de moignon inutile. Ce n'était pas le feu, non... » {n}Kibellah ouvre les yeux en inspirant avec difficulté.{/n} « La fureur de la charge conductrice. C'est elle qui vous a marqué, hérétique. Je reconnais votre blessure, car j'ai moi-même pu l'observer sur ceux que j'accompagne de l'autre côté dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. »

« Les bords sont carbonisés, la chair est lacérée et le pouce est en piteux état. Il a tenu l'arme avec trois doigts seulement et utilisé son autre main pour se stabiliser. Je note également la présence de résidus de fyceline. On peut donc en déduire qu'il a reçu cette blessure récemment. Mais il n'aurait pas eu le temps de la panser s'il l'avait reçue dans le sanctuaire. Ce genre de marques et d'odeurs se retrouve sur les corps de ceux qui travaillent près de sources de Force motrice. J'ai moi-même pu les observer sur ceux que j'accompagne de l'autre côté dans les salles des réacteurs à plasma. »
